    • Method Detail

      • determineDBStates

        public void determineDBStates()
        Used to create the SQL Tables if they do not exist. Otherwise the tables existence will be checked and nothing else will be done.

      • createProfileTables

        public void createProfileTables()
        Creates the tables associated with profiles. TABLE_PROFILE_STUDENTS, TABLE_PROFILE_ALUMNI, TABLE_PROFILE_EMPLOYEE.

      • dropProfileTables

        public void dropProfileTables(boolean boolStudent,
                              boolean boolAlumni,
                              boolean boolEmployee)
        Drops the tables associated with profiles. TABLE_PROFILE_STUDENTS, TABLE_PROFILE_ALUMNI, TABLE_PROFILE_EMPLOYEE.
        Parameters:
        boolStudent - If TABLE_PROFILE_STUDENTS should be dropped.
        boolAlumni - If TABLE_PROFILE_ALUMNI should be dropped.
        boolEmployee - If TABLE_PROFILE_EMPLOYEE should be dropped.

      • createEventsTables

        public void createEventsTables()
        Creates the tables associated with events. TABLE_EVENTS_MASTER.

      • createSkillTables

        public void createSkillTables()
        Creates the tables associated with skills. TABLE_SKILLS_MASTER, TABLE_SKILLS_STUDENT.

      • dropSkillTables

        public void dropSkillTables(boolean boolMaster,
                            boolean boolStudent)
        Drops the tables associated with skills. TABLE_SKILLS_MASTER, TABLE_SKILLS_STUDENT.
        Parameters:
        boolMaster - If TABLE_SKILLS_MASTER should be dropped.
        boolStudent - If TABLE_SKILLS_STUDENT should be dropped.

      • createProjectTables

        public void createProjectTables()
        Creates the tables associated with projects. TABLE_PROJECT_INDEX, TABLE_PROJECT_SKILLS.
